name: Dead on the move
description:
Was made for Ludum Dare 45: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/45/dead-on-the-move

An old school NES shoot’em up where you fight on top of your trusty Van Nothing.

Use your arsenal of weapons to fight off trucks of zombies and stop them from infecting you, or falling off of your Van into the fast speeding by road.

Assault Rifle: Fully automatic but does low damage, effective for medium to long range encounters

Shotgun: Inaccurate but high damage means its effective at taking down Zombies close range

Rocket Launcher: High damage explosive, perfect for taking out hostile vehicles

Keyboard and mouse input only:

AD - Move
Space - Jump
LeftMouse - Shoot
1, 2, 3 - Weapon Select

Thanks for playing my game
